CustomField.description: The portion of the combined Budget/Expense Amounts to be pre-billed. Defaults to and must always be same currency as Project. This field is a replacement for the old Pre-Billed Amount field (PreBilledAmount__c) which did not allow non-integer decimals.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The portion of the combined Budget/Expense Amounts to be pre-billed. Defaults to and must always be same currency as Project. This field is a replacement for the old Pre-Billed Amount field (PreBilledAmount__c) which did not allow non-integer decimals.
CustomField.label: Pre-Billed Amount
